forFP1
Class UtilityMethods

java.lang.Object
  forFP1.UtilityMethods

public class UtilityMethods
extends java.lang.Object

A UtilityMethods class consists of static methods that construct text fields of JTextField objects, labels of JLabel objects, and buttons of JButton objects.

Method Detail

makeTextField

public static javax.swing.JTextField makeTextField(int theWidth,
                                                   int theHeight,
                                                   int theX,
                                                   int theY,
                                                   java.awt.Container theCP)
Constructs a text field with the given width, height, horizontal-dimension value, vertical-dimension value, and container.

Parameters:
theWidth - The given width to determine how wide the text field is.
theHeight - The given height to determine how tall the text field is.
theX - The given horizontal-dimension value to move text field left or right.
theY - The given vertical-dimensional value to move text field up or down.
theCP - The given container of the text field.
Returns:
Returns the newly constructed text field.

makeLabel

public static javax.swing.JLabel makeLabel(java.lang.String theLabel,
                                           int theWidth,
                                           int theHeight,
                                           int theX,
                                           int theY,
                                           java.awt.Container theCP)
Constructs a new label with the given text, width, height, horizontal-dimension value, vertical-dimension value, and container of the label.

Parameters:
theLabel - The given text to set the words that appear on the label..
theWidth - The given width to determine how wide the label is.
theHeight - The given height to determine how tall the label is.
theX - The given horizontal-dimension value to move label left or right.
theY - The given vertical-dimension value to move label up or down.
theCP - The given container of the label.
Returns:
Returns the newly constructed label.

makeButton

public static javax.swing.JButton makeButton(java.lang.String theLabel,
                                             int theWidth,
                                             int theHeight,
                                             int theX,
                                             int theY,
                                             java.awt.event.ActionListener theHandler,
                                             java.awt.Container theCP)
Constructs a new button with the given text, width, height, horizontal-dimension value, vertical-dimension value, and handler of the button.

Parameters:
theLabel - The given text to set the words that appear on the button.
theWidth - The given width to determine how wide the button is.
theHeight - The given height to determine how tall the button is.
theX - The given horizontal-dimension value to move button left or right.
theY - The given vertical-dimension value to move button up or down.
theHandler - The given handler to determine what button does.
theCP - The given container of the button.
Returns:
Returns the newly constructed button.
